metadata.title: CVE-2020-26144 on Ubuntu 14.04 LTS (trusty) - medium
metadata.description: An issue was discovered on Samsung Galaxy S3 i9305 4.4.4 devices. The WEP,WPA, WPA2, and WPA3 implementations accept plaintext A-MSDU frames as longas the first 8 bytes correspond to a valid RFC1042 (i.e., LLC/SNAP) headerfor EAPOL. An adversary can abuse this to inject arbitrary network packetsindependent of the network configuration.

criterions.comment: linux: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'ESM criteria, was needed').
